text:
Al Ahed FC is a football club that plays in the Lebanese Premier League. They are based in Beirut, the capital city of Lebanon.
The club has won 1 AFC Cup title, 7 league titles, 6 Lebanese FA Cup titles, 7 Lebanese Super Cup titles, 5 Lebanese Elite Cup titles, and 1 Lebanese Federation Cup title. In 2019 they became the first club from Lebanon to win the AFC Cup.
